title: 服务器崩溃
author: 子不语
txt_content:
本帖最后由 子不语 于 2014-11-19 23:18 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Would you like a cupcake?

Time: 11/19/14 12:36 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content: 内存不足，你需要更多内存。

replies.author: 独孤粽
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出，卸除一些mod或插件会有所改善
